detaileddescription.para: nfs4_op_open: NFS4_OP_OPEN, opens and eventually creates a regular file.
NFS4_OP_OPEN, opens and eventually creates a regular file.

parameterdescription.para: [INOUT] Pointer to the compound request's data

simplesect.para: NFS4_OK if successfull, other values show an error.

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_op_open_Free: frees what was allocared to handle nfs4_op_open.
Frees what was allocared to handle nfs4_op_open.
